title: Elegant QT Escape in the Heart of Canberra with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
For a slice of cultural cool, discover your ultimate base for exploring Australia’s capital city at QT Canberra. With a unique architectural design fusing wooden beams, polished marble flooring and splashes of colourful decor, QT tips its hat to a city that needs no introduction. Cast your vote for a luxurious stay close to Molonglo River and experience an escape that places you within walking distance of stylish bars, restaurants, art galleries and Parliament House. After days spent exploring, retreat to your stylish abode in the heart of the NewActon precinct and feast on innovative Italian delights at Capitol Bar & Grill, a must for dining during your stay.

Stepping out of the hotel has you in the centre of all things most-loved about Canberra. The buzzing Kingston Foreshore is the place to be on a summer day, where you can hop between bars and restaurants while enjoying the lakeside views, and it's only a 10-minute drive away. Detour past the Australian War Memorial for a heartfelt look into the country's past, and for arguably the best view of Canberra, head straight down Anzac Parade, across Lake Burley Griffin, and over to Old Parliament House.

description:
Creature comfort takes on new meaning with a stay alongside some of the world's most majestic animals with a five-star stay within Canberra's National Zoo & Aquarium. Go where the wild things are and stay in safari-style lodge accommodation, offering views over the enclosures or pristine nature.

Enjoy an included animal encounter, which could involve meeting a tiger, lion or hyena, having an owl perch on your arm or hanging out with playful meerkats (please note that personal choices and preferences cannot be accommodated).

Jamala Wildlife Lodge is so much more than a once-in-a-lifetime stay; it's an invitation to learn more about the importance of wildlife conservation. As a member of the Zoo and Aquarium Association, proudly accredited under their Animal Welfare program, this incredible lodge aims to raise funds that help the zoo and aquarium grow and support its breeding programs.

Animal welfare is one of the top priorities and animals have the option to be near the room or far away and out of sight. This incredible lodge simply affords you the bucket-list opportunity to stay in opulent surroundings and gain a fascinating insight into the National Zoo & Aquarium's incredible wildlife.
